content.rendered:
Our Services

Whether you are a business owner or an individual who needs urgent and difficult to ship items or parcels delivered, with extra care for your fragile products, Interlink logistics is here to help.

Same-Day Courier Services

Perfect for time-critical or perishable goods. We cover a large range of parcels from documents, small or large to light haulage.

Scheduled Delivery

We understand that your business success relies on accurate logistics. That’s where our scheduled delivery service can add extra value. We offer guaranteed delivery windows on a recurring basis or as a one-off solution. 

Next Day Delivery / Overnight

Whether a one-off or a recurring scheduled delivery for next day delivery / overnight courier , our reliable couriers will do everything meet your needs. You have full control over how, when and where your deliveries are dispatched and delivered.

Palleted loads

For when you need to move large palleted goods across the UK . Our vehicles and drivers are specially equipped to move your palleted goods. We offer this service on a recurring basis or as a one-off solution. 

MAN AND VAN

Get local help -Cost Effective

Need an extra pair of hands to give you a lift? Hire a man and van to help you get you on the move with affordable rates and flexible options, it couldn’t be easier.

Nationwide delivery service. Fully insured and available 24/7.  Available for a large range of services from carrying goods, light removals, last minute shopping for small or large products !  Goods in transit insurred for up to £ 10 000. 

More Services

Document Courier Service

Private legal documents, tenders for contracts, property deeds, personal documents…there are certain deliveries you simply can’t take risks with.

We deliver your sensitive documents safely and securely.

We’ll pick up your documents within 60 minutes , and deliver directly.

Fragile and High Value Courier Service

We provide the best in class courier service for fragile and high value goods.  We provide a direct, dedicated service . For your piece of mind and extra safety-we only take your good onboard.

Some of the items which we have securely delivered:

Jewellery, Watches, Wines, Vintage Furniture , Antiques, IT equipment etc. 
Door to Door Luggage Courier Service

Traveling with many large luggages can be difficult.

travel stress free and send your suitcase or luggage across the UK.

We guarantee a safe & secure luggage delivery day and night .

Building Materials Courier Service

Like many others industries, the building industry is entirely reliant on good deliveries. Whether you urgently need collected & delivered building materials or large steel components, we can help. You can rely on fast and reliable service at a fair cost.

Freight Logistics Courier Service

We can make sure your clients get their items fast and safe. Save time and money with our simple yet efficient online booking system. No phone calls, no emails. Hassle free deliveries in minutes. Our freight solution is amongst the most efficient and cost effective on the market. Booking and tracking your deliveries couldn’t be easier regardless the size or complexity. Also, we provide the option of reverse logistics. Our delivery partners are happy to wait and return to collection whenever you need to send an item for exchange or return at a discounted price.

Garden Centres & DIY Courier Service

We are happy to assign the right vehicle size and allocate a driver to take care of your purchase in minutes. No matter it’s a small or large plant, garden furniture, a tool or a DIY product such as fencing – paving & walling, greenhouses & grow houses or paint & wood treatments we can get it to your desired location quick and secure.

We also can get to you urgently heating and plumbing items, power tools, sealants, electrical lightning parts or any other items regardless the size. Using our specialist delivery services comes with piece of mind at very low costs so you can focus on what matters. Your project delivered on time!  

Tyre Courier Service

With our tyre courier service, you can rest assure your delivery will be always on time. Whether you need to transport single or bulk tyres from a warehouse, a local business or a domestic customer, we can help. Not all tyres are the same. This is why we provide the right vehicle regardless of the size and shape- from regular car tyres to heavy duty extra-large.

Medical Courier Service

A dedicated and reliable courier can be  life saving.

Whether, you need to send patient records, x-rays scans, medical supplies or equipment, we can help.

You can rely on safe, secure and time-sensitive deliveries.

Engineering Components Courier Service

Time is money, and you know that well when you’re a business owner.

You also know that the faster you can deliver your packages, the better it will be.

That is why we guarantee that all our deliveries will be made on time.

Sports Equipment Courier Service

Shipping large, delicate and valuable sports equipment can be difficult. 

We offer a dedicated delivery service for all sports equipment items, such as surfboards, bikes, golf gear, skis etc.

Car Parts Courier Service

When it comes to car parts, time is money. Whether you have a tight deadline or if tomorrow is not an option, we can help. We provide same day delivery for the automotive industries and local garages.

Events Courier Service

Organising a event can be stressful. Whether it’s a private or corporate event, a festival, a charity, fundraising , community event or exhibition we can help moving your items from A to B. We can deliver anything from technical equipment, furniture, catering units. You name it!

No matter the type of service required same-day, next day , overnight or scheduled delivery, our delivery partners are happy to collect and deliver your items to you with great care!

Furniture Courier Service

Are you looking for a company to take care of your furniture courier services? Look no further! With Interlink Logistics your items are in safe hands. Whether you need collected an antique chair or a furniture item from one site to another we can take good care and deliver in no time.  At Interlink logistics, we work closely with every client, taking time to understand your business, organize ourselves around your requirements, to provide the right pick and pack services.

Hire Equipment Courier Service

Hire equipment is vital for many industries. This can save time and money on maintenance. We can assign a delivery driver to pick up your equipment from multiple locations and deliver straight to you quickly. You can also use our specialist delivery service to return your items at a low cost with reverse logistics. If you are looking for a quick and trustworthy courier service, book online today!

Wholesale Courier Service

 

The wholesale industry plays a large role in every economy. It is directly linked to sectors such as retail, hospitality, leisure and more. Due to the natural market volatility, there is times when the stock levels needs adjustment quickly.

 

You need a reliable and trustworthy courier to look after your stock transfer fast and safe. If you need to send loose items or even bulk, Interlink Logistics can be your reliable partner. We operate nationwide , so we can pick up and deliver anywhere in the UK .

Contact us to see what we can do for you !

Enqury Now
